product_name: Eureka Lightning Bug Sleeping Bag - Kids' - 2014 Overstock
long_description: The Eureka Lightning Bug Sleeping Bag for kids features the same materials as an adult-size rectangular bag, but in a fun design that your child will love. ThermaShield polyester fibers are rated to keep your child warm down to about 45degF, for comfort on warm backpacking trips. Full-length zipper can be fully unzipped to use the bag like a blanket, or to mate it with like models to create a double sleeping bag. Anti-snag zipper ensures smooth, trouble-free zipper operation. Insulated draft tube runs the entire length of the zipper to seal in warmth. Interior pocket. The Eureka Lightning Sleeping Bag comes with a stuff sack. Overstock.
short_description: The Eureka Lightning Bug Sleeping Bag for kids features the same materials as an adult-size rectangular bag, but in a fun design that your child will love.
